selected_quotes: And here's a quick and easy introduction to the issue
Some reflections on the need for refugee repatriation to be truly safe and voluntary
Very helpful paper @JFCrisp @mobilitymuse on voluntary returns and repatriation. Particularly timely reading these day…
@fasterthanican @RCKKenya @RCKDirector @ACTAlliance Why the principle of voluntariness in refugee repatriation is so important…
@fasterthanican @RCKKenya @RCKDirector @ACTAlliance Why the principle of voluntariness in refugee repatriation is so important and must be respected

citation.journal: Journal on Migration and Human Security
citation.title: Safe and Voluntary Refugee Repatriation: From Principle to Practice

facebook.title: Refugee Studies Centre
facebook.summary:
Some weekend reading - a new article by Jeff Crisp and Katy Long:

'Safe and voluntary refugee repatriation: from principle to practice', in the Journal on Migration and Human Security

The article discusses the principles of voluntariness, safety, and dig

author.name: Jeff Crisp
author.description: Tweeting mainly on refugees. Refugee Studies Centre Oxford; Chatham House London; Refugees International Washington DC. Former Head of Policy Development, UNHCR

author.description: Je suis directeur d'études @MSF_Crash. Ces tweets n'engagent néanmoins que leur auteur quand bien même s'intéresseraient-ils en priorité à l'action humanitaire.

author.name: Tom Colley
author.description: Humanitarian worker. Cricket fan & @swfc supporter. Abu Tao'am. I'm the one without the 'tasche. All opinions my own. RTs are not necessarily endorsements.
